survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from visitors about their experience in urban parks to improve facilities, services, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit this urban park?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options are clear and cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you visit this urban park?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for visiting this park? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for visiting this park? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the park?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale format (radio buttons). Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the park?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in this park?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in this park?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of seating areas in the park?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale format (radio buttons). Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of seating areas in the park?

questions.question_text: Have you participated in any organized events or activities in the park?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for yes/no selection. Follow up with Q7 if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Route to Q7 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you participated in any organized events or activities in the park?

questions.question_text: If yes, how satisfied were you with the events or activities?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q6 is answered with 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale format (radio buttons). Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Only display if Q6 answer is 'Yes'.

script.question_text: If yes, how satisfied were you with the events or activities?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q6 is answered with 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How safe do you feel in the park during the day?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale format (radio buttons). Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How safe do you feel in the park during the day?

questions.question_text: How safe do you feel in the park during the evening?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale format (radio buttons). Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How safe do you feel in the park during the evening?

questions.question_text: Are there any specific amenities you feel are missing in the park?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Are there any specific amenities you feel are missing in the park?
